name: interrenal
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
between the kidneys (= the two small organs that take away waste matter from the blood to produce urine): interrenal cell activity The interrenal tissue is composed of two types of cells. Related word
renal
More examplesFewer examplesInterrenal tissue surrounds the smaller branches of the vein.The interrenal cells of the adult fish reach their greatest size just before the breeding period.Earlier findings indicate that the interrenal tissue is irregularly distributed in fish and amphibians.Interrenal activity may be affected by behavioural interactions.
